built: dept-orchestrate.sh - JSON spawn plan generator from resolve-departments.sh output
dept-status.sh - atomic read/write of per-department status files with flock/mkdir locking
dept-gate.sh - handoff gate validator with polling (ux-complete, api-contract, all-depts)
dept-cleanup.sh - safe coordination file remover (preserves plan/summary/toon/md)
34 BATS tests across 4 test files (all green)
